__e: I mean, I take something for my anxiety and stuff, but people are still always like, "lighten up, Rudy.
He knows how to take the fear you have about yourself and use it against you.
I wish I could give you an emotional Heimlich 'cause you could cough up that wad of fear and anxiety but I can't.
And what I've learned is, the best way to end your fear is to face it yourself.
Not talking about our fears just made them worse than they are.
You can't love someone without making yourself open to their problems, their fears.
